name: Wizard Couple Survivors
description:
You and your wizard partner have been set upon by a horde! Protect each other with your magic as you try to survive!

This game was created in 3 days for Wowie Jam 4.0 - August 12-15, 2022.

Controls:

WASD to move

Developed by nuzcraft

Sprites by Oryx @ https://www.oryxdesignlab.com/

Sounds by SFXR @ https://sfxr.me/
